snippet.title: Alpha Rooms Trailer
snippet.description:
SteamLink: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3014230/Alpha_Rooms/
AlphaFoundation: https://linktr.ee/alphacommunity2024
Music by: Kenan Kanat

Welcome to Alpha Rooms!

Use your intellect to navigate through this world full of traps. Every wrong decision may lead to death. Sensing the dangers ahead and developing a strategy will be your strongest weapons. Can you challenge this infinity without losing touch with reality?

Journey into the Depths of the Unknown

Step into the unknown depths of Alpha Rooms. Every room hides a different story and mysteries waiting to be solved. While following the traces of Soviet secrets, you will uncover clues left behind by American explorers. But beware, every step takes you deeper into the unknown.

No Escape, Face It!

Enemies lurk in every corner of Alpha Rooms. To survive, you must run, hide, and be strategic. Facing them head-on isn’t always the best choice, as the dangers awaiting you are not only physical but also a test of the mind. Choose to escape, or time will become your enemy.

Endless Labyrinth: Lost Minds

In this labyrinth with no beginning or end, you will push the limits of reality. Every step brings you deeper, but every corner might be a dead end. When you hear the whispers of the lost minds, you will realize there’s no turning back. Will you find the exit?

Moments Where Reality Breaks

The unique atmosphere of Alpha Rooms warps reality, pulling you into a world of unease. Every moment will make you question what is real; the line between truth and illusion will blur. In this world, only the brave can discover the truth—others will be lost.
